titleHeader: It's all going to be alright!
dailyEntry: Waking up everyday, with tens and hundreds of notifications from the news app, it's getting all tiring! I understand we need to get informed but doesn't that have a limit? I feel like the more I read, the more depressed I get.

titleHeader: I'm inside my home, and I'm thinking...
dailyEntry: Where would I be, if it wasn't for this horrible situation? Maybe outside walking the dog, maybe out with my friends. I don't know! There were times when I was to lazy to get out of my comfort but it's now that I realize that I've taken all this for granted. I wish I could go out now but it's safer to stay home...

I keep getting calls from friends and family that have been diagnosed with this terrifying pandemic. I feel bad, but it's out of my control so I pray for them. I'm blessed to be able to stay home and still provide for my family. A lot of other friends are also losing their job, but they will get back up soon!
